about_the_game:
You control a space station in the form of a cube that protects the planet from invaders.

The cube consists of towers of different colors, the ships of the invaders are also of different colors, you must turn the sides of the cube so that the color of the tower matches the color of the invader's ship, until you do this the ship will attack the cube and take life from it. As soon as life is over you will lose.

After the color matches, the tower will fire and destroy the ship.

Hold out for as long as possible and get points for it, become the leader of the game on the leaderboard.

If you make all sides of the same color, you will automatically win with 9999 points.
detailed_description:
You control a space station in the form of a cube that protects the planet from invaders.

The cube consists of towers of different colors, the ships of the invaders are also of different colors, you must turn the sides of the cube so that the color of the tower matches the color of the invader's ship, until you do this the ship will attack the cube and take life from it. As soon as life is over you will lose.

After the color matches, the tower will fire and destroy the ship.

Hold out for as long as possible and get points for it, become the leader of the game on the leaderboard.

If you make all sides of the same color, you will automatically win with 9999 points.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 32-bit 12.04+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Phenom II
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
